alert.note: Alert for Conway; Pope; Van Buren; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 8:08PM CST until January 11 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Conway County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Yell County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 900 PM CST. * At 808 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dardanelle, or near Russellville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Russellville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Hector... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Claude... Cleveland... Dabney... Jerusalem... Galla Creek WMA... Blick... Mosley... Appleton... Beverage Town... Alread... Brock Creek Campground... Holla Bend... Rupert... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
